snippet: Apollo’s $1.3 billion takeover of the parent of Chuck E. Cheese’s ranks among the top five leveraged buyouts of an American restaurant chain. Here’s the list of the top 10.
abstract: Apollo’s $1.3 billion takeover of the parent of Chuck E. Cheese’s ranks among the top five leveraged buyouts of an American restaurant chain. Here’s the list of the top 10.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Ranking the Biggest Restaurant Leveraged Buyouts
